errorDocument.description: Name of the error document for the website. See below.

expectedBucketOwner.description: Account ID of the expected bucket owner.

indexDocument.description: Name of the index document for the website. See below.

redirectAllRequestsTo.description: Redirect behavior for every request to this bucket's website endpoint. See below. Conflicts with `error_document`, `index_document`, and `routing_rule`.

routingRuleDetails.description:
JSON array containing [routing rules](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-s3-websiteconfiguration-routingrules.html)
describing redirect behavior and when redirects are applied. Use this parameter when your routing rules contain empty String values (`""`) as seen in the example above.

routingRules.description: List of rules that define when a redirect is applied and the redirect behavior. See below.

websiteDomain.description: Domain of the website endpoint. This is used to create Route 53 alias records.
